name: participant-portal
description: Portal for researchers to view study data and participants

scripts.db:reset: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml run --rm api npx ts-node scripts db/reset
scripts.db:test-data: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml run --rm api npx ts-node scripts db/reset db/admin-data db/initial-prod-data db/test-data
scripts.db:prod-data: docker-compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml run --rm api npx ts-node scripts db/reset db/initial-prod-data
scripts.db:admin-data: docker-compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml run --rm api npx ts-node scripts db/reset db/admin-data
scripts.db:update-surveys: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml run --rm api npx ts-node scripts db/surveys/update-forms
scripts.psql: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec postgres psql -U portal portal
scripts.pluck:api: docker cp participant-api:/home/node/package.json api && docker cp participant-api:/home/node/yarn.lock api
scripts.pluck:app: docker cp participant-app:/home/node/package.json app && docker cp participant-app:/home/node/yarn.lock app
scripts.migrate: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml run --rm api npm run db:migrate
scripts.migrate:status: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml run --rm api npm run db:migrate:status
scripts.migrate:undo: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml run --rm api npm run db:migrate:undo
scripts.migrate:create: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml run --rm api npm run db:migrate:create --
scripts.test:run: docker-compose -f docker-compose.test.yml exec api-test npm run mocha
